Table.Name: Command
Table.Command:
DECLARE @ParentCode NVARCHAR(20) SET @ParentCode = '{?DocKey@}'
DECLARE @localCurrency NVARCHAR(3) SET @localCurrency = (SELECT TOP 1 MainCurncy FROM OADM)
DECLARE @TotalLines INT SET @TotalLines = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITT1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Father = @ParentCode)
DECLARE @LinesWithNonLocalCurrency INT SET @LinesWithNonLocalCurrency = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITT1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Father = @ParentCode AND TS0.Currency <> @localCurrency)
SELECT T0.Code AS 'ParentCode', T1.ItemName AS 'ParentDescription', T1.InvntryUom AS 'UoM', T0.Qauntity, T0.TreeType, T2.Price AS 'ParentPrice', T2.Currency AS 'ParentCurrency', CASE WHEN @TotalLines - @LinesWithNonLocalCurrency = 0 THEN (SELECT TOP 1 TS0.Currency FROM ITT1 TS0 WHERE TS0.Father = T0.Code) ELSE @localCurrency END AS 'TotalComponentCurrency', CASE WHEN @TotalLines - @LinesWithNonLocalCurrency = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS 'UseTotalLCForComponentTotal' FROM OITT T0 JOIN OITM T1 ON T0.Code = T1.ItemCode LEFT JOIN ITM1 T2 ON T0.Code = T2.ItemCode AND T0.PriceList = T2.PriceList WHERE T0.Code = @ParentCode

Table.Name: Command
Table.Command:
DECLARE @ParentCode NVARCHAR(20) SET @ParentCode = '{?DocKey@}'
DECLARE @localCurrency NVARCHAR(3) SET @localCurrency = (SELECT TOP 1 MainCurncy FROM OADM) DECLARE @directRate NVARCHAR(1) SET @directRate = (SELECT TOP 1 DirectRate FROM OADM)
SELECT T0.Father, T0.Code, T1.ItemName, T1.InvntryUom AS 'UoM', T0.Quantity, T1.OnHand, T0.Warehouse, T0.Price, T0.Quantity * T0.Price AS 'Total', CASE T0.Currency WHEN @localCurrency THEN T0.Price * T0.Quantity ELSE CASE WHEN @directRate <> 'Y' THEN T0.Quantity * T0.Price / (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.Rate, 1) FROM ORTT TS0 WHERE TS0.Currency = T0.Currency AND TS0.RateDate = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)) ELSE T0.Quantity * T0.Price * (SELECT ISNULL(TS0.Rate, 1) FROM ORTT TS0 WHERE TS0.Currency = T0.Currency AND TS0.RateDate = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)) END END AS 'TotalLC', T0.Currency FROM ITT1 T0 JOIN OITM T1 ON T0.Code = T1.ItemCode WHERE T0.Father = @ParentCode

FormulaFieldDefinitions.FormulaFieldDefinition: switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Side: '+ ToText(PageNumber,'#') +' af '+Totext(TotalPageCount,'#'), {@X_Language} = 'NO', 'Side: '+ ToText(PageNumber,'#') +' av '+Totext(TotalPageCount,'#'), {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Seite: '+ ToText(PageNumber,'#') +' von '+Totext(TotalPageCount,'#'), {@X_Language} = 'ES', 'Página: '+ ToText(PageNumber,'#') +' de '+Totext(TotalPageCount,'#'), {@X_Language} = 'NL', 'Pagina: '+ ToText(PageNumber,'#') +' van '+Totext(TotalPageCount,'#'), {@X_Language} = 'FR', 'Page: '+ ToText(PageNumber,'#') +' de '+Totext(TotalPageCount,'#'), TRUE, 'Page: '+ ToText(PageNumber,'#') +' of '+Totext(TotalPageCount,'#') )
switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'På Lager', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Auf Lager', True, 'On Hand' //Default English )
switch( {@X_Language} = 'DK', 'Total for komponenter', {@X_Language} = 'DE', 'Total für Komponenten', True, 'Total Components' //Default English )
